rulesets.name: Standard
rulesets.description: No modification to the standard gameplay rules and mechanics.

rulesets.name: Back to Basics
rulesets.description: Monsters lose all abilities.

rulesets.name: Silenced Summoners
rulesets.description: Summoners do not give any stat buffs or debuffs or grant/use any abilities.

rulesets.name: Aim True
rulesets.description: Melee and Ranged attacks always hit their target.

rulesets.name: Super Sneak
rulesets.description: All Melee attack Monsters have the Sneak ability.

rulesets.name: Weak Magic
rulesets.description: Magic attacks hit Armor before reducing Health.

rulesets.name: Unprotected
rulesets.description: Monsters do not have any armor and do not get armor from Abilities or Summoner Buffs.

rulesets.name: Target Practice
rulesets.description: All Ranged and Magic attack Monsters have the Snipe ability.

rulesets.name: Fog of War
rulesets.description: Monsters lose the Sneak and Snipe abilities.

rulesets.name: Armored Up
rulesets.description: All Monsters have 2 Armor in addition to their normal Armor stat.

rulesets.name: Healed Out
rulesets.description: All healing abilities are removed from Monsters and Summoners.

rulesets.name: Earthquake
rulesets.description: Non-flying Monsters take 2 Melee damage at the end of each round.

rulesets.name: Reverse Speed
rulesets.description: Monsters with the lowest Speed attack first and have the highest chance of evading attacks.

rulesets.name: Close Range
rulesets.description: Ranged attacks may be used in the first position in battles.

rulesets.name: Heavy Hitters
rulesets.description: All Monsters have the Knock Out ability.

rulesets.name: Equalizer
rulesets.description: The initial Health of all Monsters is equal to that of the Monster on either team with the highest base Health.

rulesets.name: Keep Your Distance
rulesets.description: Monsters with Melee attack may not be used in battles.

rulesets.name: Lost Legendaries
rulesets.description: Legendary Monsters may not be used in battles.

rulesets.name: Melee Mayhem
rulesets.description: Melee attack Monsters can attack from any position.

rulesets.name: Taking Sides
rulesets.description: Neutral Monsters may not be used in battles.

rulesets.name: Rise of the Commons
rulesets.description: Only Common and Rare Monsters may be used in battles.

rulesets.name: Up Close & Personal
rulesets.description: Only Monsters with Melee attack may be used in battles.

rulesets.name: Broken Arrows
rulesets.description: Ranged attack Monsters may not be used in battles.

rulesets.name: Little League
rulesets.description: Only Monsters & Summoners that cost 4 Mana or less may be used in battles.

rulesets.name: Lost Magic
rulesets.description: Monsters with Magic attack may not be used in battles.

rulesets.name: Even Stevens
rulesets.description: Only Monsters with even Mana costs may be used in battles.

rulesets.name: Odd Ones Out
rulesets.description: Only Monsters with odd Mana costs may be used in battles.

rulesets.name: Noxious Fumes
rulesets.description: All Monsters start the battle Poisoned.

rulesets.name: Stampede
rulesets.description: The Trample ability can trigger multiple times per attack if the trampled Monster is killed.

rulesets.name: Equal Opportunity
rulesets.description: All Monsters have the Opportunity ability.

rulesets.name: Explosive Weaponry
rulesets.description: All Monsters have the Blast ability

rulesets.name: Holy Protection
rulesets.description: All Monsters have the Divine Shield ability.

rulesets.name: Spreading Fury
rulesets.description: All Monsters have the Enrage ability.

quests.name: Lyanna's Call
quests.description: The kingdom of Anumun has been invaded! Take a team of your best Earth monsters, and repel the enemy forces.
quests.objective: Win 5 ranked battles with the Earth Splinter.

quests.name: Rising Dead
quests.description: The dead are rising up to claim the Splinterlands for themselves, assemble your best Death team and join the fray!
quests.objective: Win 5 ranked battles with the Death Splinter.

quests.name: Defend the Borders
quests.description: Chaos seems to be erupting all across the Splinterlands and yet Khymeria is stable.  Don't let wretches from other Splinters ruin the sacred and protected homeland.  Form a patrol and keep undesirables out of our home.
quests.objective: Win 5 ranked battles with the Life Splinter.

quests.name: Pirate Attacks
quests.description: The waters of Azmare have been calm, but nothing like a ship catching fire in the night to spur action.  Someone has been sinking ships using magic explosives.  Head out and capture potential enemies for interrogation.  We'll find out who is responsible!
quests.objective: Win 5 ranked battles with the Water Splinter.

quests.name: Stir the Volcano
quests.description: The volcano in the Burning Lands which gives power to the Ferexians magic, has been dormant for too long. Assemble a team to venture out and rekindle the flame. Destroy anyone who gets in your way!
quests.objective: Win 5 ranked battles with the Fire Splinter.

quests.name: Gloridax Revenge
quests.description: For too long bounty hunters have been after valuable dragon scales, teeth, and other highly prized possessions. Now it is time for the Gloridax to take their revenge!
quests.objective: Win 5 ranked battles with the Dragon Splinter.

quests.name: Proving Grounds
quests.description: All great commanders must prove their mettle in the great tournament arena. Earn glory and riches and battle your way into Splinterlands legend!
quests.objective: Win 1 tournament battle with any Splinter.

quests.name: Stubborn Mercenaries
quests.description: The mercenaries that roam the Splinterlands have banded together to demand higher pay for their sacrifices. Show them that you don't need them anymore!

quests.name: Stealth Mission
quests.description: The enemy is hiding their secret weapons behind a legion of heavily armed guards. Sneak past the guards and take out the back line before it's too late!
quests.objective: Win 5 battles using a Sneak monster.

quests.name: High Priority Targets
quests.description: The enemy's ranged damage dealers are taking out our front lines! Get your best snipers and take out the high priority targets before they take you out!
quests.objective: Win 5 battles using a Snipe monster.

guild_store_items.name: Gladius Case
guild_store_items.short_desc: A pack that holds 5 Gladiator cards!

guild_store_items.name: Spy Glass
guild_store_items.short_desc: Sneak a peek at enemy Fray assignments.

guild_store_items.name: Blood Stone
guild_store_items.short_desc: Improve the drop rate of Gladiator Legendary cards!

guild_store_items.name: Power Stone
guild_store_items.short_desc: Improve the drop rate of Gladiator Gold Foil cards!
